mapper.select: SELECT ct.car_type_code, cc0.common_name AS car_type_category, cc0.common_code AS car_type_category_code, cc1.common_name AS origin_type, cc1.common_code AS origin_type_code, ct.car_type_name, cc2.common_name AS seating_capacity, cc2.common_code AS seating_capacity_code, cc3.common_name AS fuel_type, cc3.common_code AS fuel_type_code, cc4.common_name AS speed_limit, cc4.common_code AS speed_limit_code, cc5.common_name AS license_restriction, cc5.common_code AS license_restriction_code, cc6.common_name AS car_manufacturer, cc6.common_code AS car_manufacturer_code, ct.model_year, ct.car_image_name FROM car_types ct JOIN common_codes cc0 ON cc0.common_code = ct.car_type_category AND cc0.common_kind_code = 'car_type_category' JOIN common_codes cc1 ON cc1.common_code = ct.origin_type AND cc1.common_kind_code = 'origin_type' JOIN common_codes cc2 ON cc2.common_code = ct.seating_capacity AND cc2.common_kind_code = 'seating_capacity' JOIN common_codes cc3 ON cc3.common_code = ct.fuel_type AND cc3.common_kind_code = 'fuel_type' LEFT JOIN common_codes cc4 ON cc4.common_code = ct.speed_limit AND cc4.common_kind_code = 'speed_limit' JOIN common_codes cc5 ON cc5.common_code = ct.license_restriction AND cc5.common_kind_code = 'license_restriction' JOIN common_codes cc6 ON cc6.common_code = ct.car_manufacturer AND cc6.common_kind_code = 'car_manufacturer' ORDER BY car_type_code LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT ct.car_type_code, cc0.common_name AS car_type_category, cc0.common_code AS car_type_category_code, cc1.common_name AS origin_type, cc1.common_code AS origin_type_code, ct.car_type_name, cc2.common_name AS seating_capacity, cc2.common_code AS seating_capacity_code, cc3.common_name AS fuel_type, cc3.common_code AS fuel_type_code, cc4.common_name AS speed_limit, cc4.common_code AS speed_limit_code, cc5.common_name AS license_restriction, cc5.common_code AS license_restriction_code, cc6.common_name AS car_manufacturer, cc6.common_code AS car_manufacturer_code, ct.model_year FROM car_types ct JOIN common_codes cc0 ON cc0.common_code = ct.car_type_category AND cc0.common_kind_code = 'car_type_category' JOIN common_codes cc1 ON cc1.common_code = ct.origin_type AND cc1.common_kind_code = 'origin_type' JOIN common_codes cc2 ON cc2.common_code = ct.seating_capacity AND cc2.common_kind_code = 'seating_capacity' JOIN common_codes cc3 ON cc3.common_code = ct.fuel_type AND cc3.common_kind_code = 'fuel_type' LEFT JOIN common_codes cc4 ON cc4.common_code = ct.speed_limit AND cc4.common_kind_code = 'speed_limit' JOIN common_codes cc5 ON cc5.common_code = ct.license_restriction AND cc5.common_kind_code = 'license_restriction' JOIN common_codes cc6 ON cc6.common_code = ct.car_manufacturer AND cc6.common_kind_code = 'car_manufacturer' WHERE car_type_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{carTypeName}, '%') ORDER BY car_type_code LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM car_types WHERE car_type_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{carTypeName}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car_types (car_type_code, car_type_category, origin_type, car_type_name, seating_capacity, fuel_type, speed_limit, license_restriction, car_manufacturer, model_year, car_image_name, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{carTypeCode}, #{carTypeCategory}, #{originType}, #{carTypeName}, #{seatingCapacity}, #{fuelType}, #{speedLimit}, #{licenseRestriction}, #{carManufacturer}, #{modelYear}, #{carImageName}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE car_types SET car_type_category = #{carTypeCategory}, origin_type = #{originType}, car_type_name = #{carTypeName}, seating_capacity = #{seatingCapacity}, fuel_type = #{fuelType}, speed_limit = #{speedLimit}, license_restriction = #{licenseRestriction}, car_manufacturer = #{carManufacturer}, model_year = #{modelYear}, car_image_name = #{carImageName}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE car_type_code = #{carTypeCode}
